dumpObj.title: Instance of class 'class' as defined in module 'Scene'
dumpObj.documentation: This class represents an series of ClipSlots in Lives Sessionview matrix.

method.name: fire
method.doc:
fire( (Scene)arg1) -> None : Fire the scene directly. Will fire all clipslots that this scene owns and select the scene itself.
C++ signature : void fire(TPyHandle<AScene>)

method.name: fire_as_selected
method.doc:
fire_as_selected( (Scene)arg1) -> None : Fire the selected scene. Will fire all clipslots that this scene owns and select the next scene if necessary.
C++ signature : void fire_as_selected(TPyHandle<AScene>)

method.name: set_fire_button_state
method.doc:
set_fire_button_state( (Scene)arg1, (bool)arg2) -> None : Set the scene's fire button state directly. Supports all launch modes.
C++ signature : void set_fire_button_state(TPyHandle<AScene>,bool)

attribute.name: canonical_parent
attribute.type: Get the canonical parent of the scene.

attribute.name: clip_slots
attribute.type: return a list of clipslots (see class AClipSlot) that this scene covers.

attribute.name: color
attribute.type: Get/set access to the color of the Scene (RGB).

attribute.name: is_triggered
attribute.type: Const access to the scene's trigger state.

attribute.name: name
attribute.type: Get/Set the name of the scene. Might contain the substring BPM, which identifies that the scene will change the tempo when fireed. To Get/Set the temp, use the 'tempo' property of the scene.

attribute.name: tempo
attribute.type: Get/Set the the tempo value of the scene. The Song will use the Scenes tempo as soon as the Scene is fired. Returns -1 if the Scene has no tempo propery.
